full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services Requirement
#### Government of Canada - Department of National Defense
##### Tender Notice: S4448104-RFP

The Department of National Defense has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contract Information**

* **Title of the Tender:** Two (2) Junior Technologist, Electrical and Electronics Engineering
* **Solicitation Number:** S4448104
* **Notice Type:** RFP Against Supply Arrangement
* **Publication Date:** May 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 19, 2023, 11:00 AM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be Determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To be Determined

**Eligibility**

This RFP is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the following streams and categories: Technologist, Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
* Promaxis Systems Inc
* Quallium Corporation
* Quantum Management Services Limited / Les services de gestion Quantum Limitée
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* Solana Networks INC.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.

**Description of the Requirement**

The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. The resources must meet the minimum security level of Secret.

**Attachments**

The tender notice and the RFP document are available for download at the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5474/s4448104-rfp.pdf>

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gd authorised at Forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gd@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gd@forces
